short_summary: *Rock Blasting Services \\- Excavating and Earthmoving Work \\- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) \\- Estimated Value: $250,001 \\- $500,000
description: Required contractor for time sensitive preparation work for access to aggregate resources in Mannix Pit. Work includes clearing, grubbing, burning, stripping and overburden removal, and additional clearing work at Boom creek to prepare the site for an important culvert replacement. The estimated value is between $250,001 and $500,000, taxes extra. Period of contract is until April 8, 2023.
